sessions.title: Amazon SageMaker: End-to-End ML Workflows
sessions.description: Build production ML pipelines with Amazon SageMaker. Explore data preparation, model training, hyperparameter tuning, and deployment workflows for scalable machine learning.
speakers: Dr. Emily Chen, ML Architect, AWS

sessions.title: Amazon Bedrock: Building with Foundation Models
sessions.description: Leverage generative AI with Amazon Bedrock. Learn to integrate foundation models like Claude, Llama, and Stable Diffusion into applications without managing infrastructure.
speakers: Dr. Raj Sharma, AI Research Scientist, AWS
Alexandra Torres, Generative AI Lead, AWS

sessions.title: Computer Vision with Amazon Rekognition
sessions.description: Build intelligent computer vision applications with Amazon Rekognition. Explore object detection, facial analysis, text extraction, and custom model training for image and video analysis.
speakers: Michael Zhang, Computer Vision Specialist, AWS

sessions.title: MLOps: Automating Machine Learning Lifecycle
sessions.description: Implement MLOps best practices on AWS. Learn CI/CD for ML models, model monitoring, A/B testing, feature stores, and automated retraining pipelines with SageMaker Pipelines.

sessions.title: Training Large Models on SageMaker: Distributed Strategies
sessions.description: Scale model training with distributed strategies on SageMaker. Explore data parallelism, model parallelism, mixed precision training, and GPU optimization techniques.
speakers: Dr. James Park, ML Systems Engineer, AWS

sessions.title: Real-Time Inference with SageMaker Endpoints
sessions.description: Deploy ML models for real-time inference at scale. Learn endpoint configuration, auto-scaling, multi-model endpoints, and cost optimization strategies for production inference.
speakers: Linda Nguyen, ML Infrastructure Lead, AWS

sessions.title: Feature Engineering with SageMaker Feature Store
sessions.description: Build robust feature engineering pipelines with SageMaker Feature Store. Learn feature versioning, online/offline stores, feature discovery, and feature reusability patterns.
speakers: Carlos Rodriguez, Data Science Engineer, AWS

sessions.title: Neural Network Optimization for Edge Devices
sessions.description: Deploy ML models to edge devices with AWS IoT Greengrass and SageMaker Neo. Explore model quantization, pruning, compilation, and optimization for resource-constrained environments.
speakers: Dr. Yuki Tanaka, Edge AI Specialist, AWS
Marcus Brown, IoT ML Architect, AWS

sessions.title: Amazon SageMaker Autopilot: Automated Machine Learning
sessions.description: Accelerate ML development with SageMaker Autopilot. Learn automated model selection, hyperparameter optimization, and model explainability with AutoML capabilities.

sessions.title: Deep Reinforcement Learning for Autonomous Systems
sessions.description: Build autonomous systems with deep reinforcement learning on AWS. Explore AWS DeepRacer, custom RL environments, policy optimization, and simulation-to-reality transfer techniques.
speakers: Dr. Aisha Williams, RL Research Lead, AWS

sessions.title: Model Monitoring and Drift Detection
sessions.description: Ensure ML model reliability with monitoring and drift detection. Learn to detect data drift, concept drift, and model performance degradation using SageMaker Model Monitor.
speakers: Robert Johnson, ML Observability Engineer, AWS

sessions.title: Generative AI for Synthetic Data Creation
sessions.description: Generate synthetic training data with generative AI models. Explore GANs, VAEs, and diffusion models for data augmentation, privacy-preserving datasets, and simulation environments.
speakers: Dr. Sofia Martinez, Generative AI Researcher, AWS

sessions.title: AWS CEO Keynote: The Future of Cloud Computing
sessions.description: Join AWS CEO for the flagship keynote unveiling the latest innovations in cloud computing, AI/ML, and infrastructure. Discover new services, customer success stories, and the future roadmap.
speakers: Adam Selipsky, CEO, Amazon Web Services
